comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: This is the Domain Baths which were in the Woolloomooloo Bay roughly where the Olympic Boy Charlton Pool is now. In the era before plastics, the street litter was newspaper which found its way into the Ahrbour when streets were washed down, making swimming there less than pleasant.
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection
